page.title: 03VISITING TRADES PEOPLE
page.content: Because Spreyton is far from a town and surrounded by narrow twisting lanes,it is not on a bus route and people that do not have transport need mobile shops to come to them. Many things can be bought from the village shop and post office but the village is visited by a green grocer,fishmonger,butcher,baker and fish and chip van. As well as these we have a coalman.dustman,postmen,a paper man and lady,a milkman and lady for those people who do not have farm milk. Other people that visit us here, include an ice cream van, chimney sweep, electricity man to read the meters and a roadsweeper who comes occasionally to sweep the road and keep our village tidy.Barry Radmore is our special constable and the Okehampton police help us too.
